dict.string: Redesigned in 2009, critics praised the 2010 Forester for its overall competence and surefootedness, thanks to its standard all-wheel drive. While few called it fun, most said that it has fairly good handling and is generally easy to drive. Powering the Forester is either a four-cylinder engine that makes 170 horsepower or a turbocharged variant of that engine good for 224 horsepower.
